General.Name: GDEV Inc.
General.Description: GDEV Inc. operates as a gaming and entertainment company in the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It develops desktop, mobile, web, and social games. The company was formerly known as Nexters Inc. and changed its name to GDEV Inc. in June 2023. GDEV Inc. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Limassol, Cyprus.

1.name: Deutsche DWS Russia Equity Mother Fund
